channel.title: Help: Create perfect wildy area
channel.description:
I need help creating a good wildy area to people to be able to PK and not be able to teleport out.
Like a littel box closed up area where you can't get out and you can't teleport out.
Only way out is with the emotes.
Anyways, and I wanted to add so there is like a sign in the corner everytime your standing in an unsafe spot.
Help here please?

item.title: Help: Create perfect wildy area
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

You could always go to Suns website, learn java and do it yourself.

Read full topic
